label: Submission
quote: Please ensure that the template cells/formulas are visible and unlocked.
short_label: Pricing template cells/formulas must be visible and unlocked

label: Submission
quote: The Contractor shall be responsible for ensuring that the pricing information is submitted correctly and submitted by the proposal due date.
short_label: Submit pricing info correctly and by due date

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: The Quoter shall use the labor rates in their HCATS IDIQ Contract
short_label: Use HCATS IDIQ labor rates for pricing

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Quoters shall be responsible for quoting the labor categories and hours that best meet the solution they are presenting.
short_label: Quote labor categories/hours to best meet solution

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Quoters shall use the labor category titles and descriptions included in their specific HCATS IDIQ contract to map to those included in the Government’s SOW
short_label: Map labor category titles/descriptions to SOW

label: Evaluation & Award
quote: Award will be made to the Quoter whose quote meets the Government’s requirements and whose technical quote and price represent the best value to the Government.
short_label: Quote must meet requirements and represent best value

label: Submission
quote: Quoters are strongly encouraged to submit their best technical solutions and price in response to this RFQ.
short_label: Submit best technical solutions and price

label: Evaluation & Award
quote: Full and impartial consideration will be given to all quotes received pursuant to this solicitation, and the evaluation will be conducted in an equal manner.
short_label: All quotes will be given full and impartial consideration

label: Evaluation & Award
quote: Each member of the team will evaluate each quote in accordance with the technical evaluation factors stated above to determine if the quote is acceptable.
short_label: Evaluation team will rate technical quotes per factors

label: Evaluation & Award
quote: These issues may include technical and price. If the parties cannot successfully address any remaining issues, as deemed pertinent at the sole discretion of the Government, the Government reserves the right to communicate with the next best-suited Quoter based on the original analysis and address any remaining issues.
short_label: Quoter must address remaining technical and price issues

label: General Administrative
quote: Once the Government has begun communications with the next best-suited Quoter, no further communications with the previous Quoter will be entertained until after the task order has been awarded.
short_label: No further communications with previous Quoter until award

label: Compliance & Regulatory
quote: This contract incorporates one or more clauses by reference, with the same force and effect as if they were given in full text.
short_label: Contract incorporates clauses by reference

label: Compliance & Regulatory
quote: Upon request, the Contracting Officer will make their full text available.
short_label: CO will provide full text of incorporated clauses upon request

label: Compliance & Regulatory
quote: This contract incorporates one or more clauses by reference, with the same force and effect as if they were given in full text.
short_label: Clauses by reference have same force as full text

label: Contract Type & Terms
quote: The period of performance of this contract shall be one year from the date of award, with 4 one year options.
short_label: Contractor must perform for one year with 4 options

label: Contract Type & Terms
quote: The contract term shall be for a period of one year from the date of award, subject to the Government's option to extend the term of the contract in accordance with the clause entitled, 'Option to Extend the Term of the Contract' FAR 52.217-9 contained herein.
short_label: Contract term is one year, subject to extension option

label: Risk Management & Oversight Authority
quote: The Contracting Officer will provide a written notice of such designation to the Contractor within five working days after contract award... The designation letter will set forth the authorities and limitations of the COR under the contract.
short_label: Recognize COR authority and limitations as designated

label: Risk Management & Oversight Authority
quote: The Contracting Officer cannot authorize the COR or any other representative to sign documents, such as contracts, contract modifications, etc., that require the signature of the Contracting Officer.
short_label: Do not accept direction to sign documents requiring CO signature

label: Risk Management & Oversight Authority
quote: The Contracting Officer is the only person authorized to approve changes in any of the requirements of this contract.
short_label: Only CO can approve changes to contract requirements

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: No cost chargeable to the proposed contract can be incurred before receipt of a fully executed contract or specific authorization from the Contracting Officer.
short_label: Do not incur costs before executed contract or CO authorization

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Payment requests must be submitted electronically through the U.S. Department of the Treasury's Invoice Processing Platform System (IPP).
short_label: Submit payment requests electronically via IPP

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: To constitute a proper invoice, the payment request must comply with the requirements identified in FAR 32.905(b), 'Payment documentation and process' and the applicable Prompt Payment clause included in this contract.
short_label: Payment requests must comply with FAR 32.905(b) and Prompt Payment

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Under this contract, the following documents are required to be submitted as an attachment to the IPP invoice: - Detailed hours, labor categories and deliverables
short_label: Submit detailed hours, labor categories, deliverables with IPP invoice

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Once registered, the Contractor is required to log in to the IPP Application at https://www.ipp.for.fiscal.treasury.gov/ and submit their invoices.
short_label: Contractor must register and submit invoices through IPP

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: If the Contractor is unable to comply with the requirement to use IPP for submitting invoices for payment, the Contractor must submit a waiver request in writing to the Contracting Officer.
short_label: If unable to use IPP, submit written waiver request to CO
